definition: shield/(currency) Vietnamese dong/currency unit of several countries (Indonesian rupiah, Dutch gulden etc)
contradictions between ourselves and the enemy/Either you are for us or against us.
USB key used as a security token in Chinese online banking
internal contradiction among the people (pretext for a purge)
pinyin: ren2 min2 nei4 bu4 mao2 dun4

definition: lit. use sb's spear to attack his shield (idiom, derived from Han Feizi 韓非子|韩非子); turning a weapon against its owner/fig. to attack an opponent using his own devices/hoist with his own petard
pinyin: yi3 zi3 zhi1 mao2 , gong1 zi3 zhi1 dun4

definition: Aegis Combat System (weapons system developed for the US Navy)
pinyin: Zhou4 si1 dun4 Zhan4 dou4 Xi4 tong3

definition: On the correct handling of internal contradictions among the people, Mao Zedong's tract of 1957
pinyin: zheng4 que4 chu3 li3 ren2 min2 nei4 bu4 mao2 dun4
containing_words.word: 正確處理人民內部矛盾

sentences.english: Its extendables-foils radiate heat and serve as a conduit to deflector shield energy.
sentences.chinese: 可展開的S翼既用於散熱，又是偏導護盾能量導管。

sentences.english: Thorn not break the shield and what are thorn in the broken spear can not co-exist.
sentences.chinese: 刺不破的盾和什麼東西都刺得破的矛不可能同時存在。

sentences.english: Shield bashing will be added, basically making dual wielding of weapons possible.
sentences.chinese: 盾撲將增加，基本上使雙揮舞的武器可能。

sentences.english: The shields and swords that hung on the walls rattled against each other.
sentences.chinese: 壁上掛的劍，盾相互撞擊，鐺鐺作響。

sentences.english: Graphic logo with the company's coat of Stuttgart where city emblem.
sentences.chinese: 圖形車標採用公司所在地斯圖加特市的盾形市徽。

sentences.english: A tight cordon of riot police, who wore helmets and wielded shields and clubs, surrounded People's Square.
sentences.chinese: 大批武警頭戴鋼盔手拿防護盾和警棍守衛在人民廣場。

sentences.english: Now, shields that cannot be pierced through and spears that can pierced through anything cannot exist at the sane time.
sentences.chinese: 刺不破的盾和什麼東西都刺得破的矛不可能同時存在。

sentences.english: There is a difference between a shield wall, with overlapping shields and merely close-order.
sentences.chinese: 盾牌相互重疊的盾牆和單純的緊密陣型是不同的。

sentences.english: My shield is the strongest.It can stop any spear in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我的盾是最結實的，它能抵擋住世界上任何矛。

sentences.english: A new species of the genus Scutellinia from Guizhou Province, China is reported and named Scutellinia sinensis M.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道在我國貴州省發現的一個盾盤菌屬新種。

sentences.english: Before long, Orion is jarred by the release of its large heat shield.
sentences.chinese: 不久後，獵戶座發出刺耳聲響，放掉龐大的防熱盾。

sentences.english: His good friend Gongsun Chujiu was willing to help him , too.
sentences.chinese: 趙盾的好朋友公孫杵臼也願意幫助他。

sentences.english: Much of the recent history of the Eastern Conference has been determined in showdowns between Detroit's D and Jordan's O.
sentences.chinese: 最近的東部聯盟對抗史大都是活塞的盾對抗喬丹的矛。

sentences.english: Shield Cadillac symbolizes the heroic army.
sentences.chinese: 盾象徵着凱迪拉克軍隊的英勇善戰。

sentences.english: I love the shield, but when you Sac the voidwalker you're screwed for a pet.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡它的盾，但是當你犧牲虛空，你就沒有寵物了。

sentences.english: Tom used a shield to protect him from injury.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆用一面盾保護自己不受傷害。

definition: halberd/long-handled weapon with pointed tip and crescent blade/combined spear and battle-ax
a staff/a rod/cane/walking stick/to flog with a stick (old)
